name: Galaxy Simulator
description:
My attempt at creating a galaxy simulator. Heavily based off of Galimulator.

Controls:

Drag mouse - Move screen
Scroll - Zoom in/out
Click on star systems to view their information
Hover over buttons to see what they do

Keyboard Controls (But why would you use these?)

W/A/S/D - Move screen
Q - Zoom out
E - Zoom in
K - New galaxy

Galaxy size is how many star systems the galaxy has in total. Your computer may not be able to handle more than a couple thousand. Worth a try...?

Factions are how many different factions will be created when you start the simulation. 

Normal mode means factions must spend time conquering unexplored territory. Anarchy mode is chaotic --- each star system will start out as part of a random faction.
